title: Whispers in the Shrouded Haze
story: The mist outside has seeped into the castle's very stones, turning familiar pathways into disorienting tunnels. Every shadow seems to writhe, every distant sound a whisper from the unseen.
effect: While this card is active, whenever a hero enters a new room (not a stairwell), they must roll a D6. On a result of 1-2, they lose 1 Sanity as their mind struggles to discern reality. Additionally, any hero ending their turn in the Blood Storage or Crypt must roll a D6; on a 1-3, unseen tendrils of mist cling to them, draining 1 Health.
